name: Gemini Flash-Lite (Latest)
description: Dynamic pointer to the latest Flash-Lite model. Currently points to Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite. Most cost-efficient option with automatic updates to newest version.
notes: POINTER - Automatically updates to latest Flash-Lite version. Google provides 2 weeks notice before switching. For stable SLAs, use versioned model strings. Currently points to gemini-2.5-flash-lite. Pricing may change with updates.
